Its happening!!!
I refreshed Twitch and it's no longer letting me in to the site. Hooray >\_>
YAY! 1.0 is live on KSPTV.
METAL KSP!. I love it!
Val!!!
The streaming has (finally) started. [http://twitch.tv/ksptv](http://twitch.tv/ksptv)
Nice soundtrack!
The twich chat is at superluminal speeds, I can barely keep up.
Look at that mk1 inline cockpit!
We've passed Plaid Factor 3!
Chat is at 60 sec slow modedammit
someone tell him to test if you can set the number of segments the fairing brakes into!!

I hope people will mention new stuff in here because I'm hard of hearing and the chat is going at superluminal speeds and I can barely keep up

- - - Updated - - -

Trying to get Das to show the clamshell fairings in separation.

I suppose there will be other streams though,
Will we get youtube preview vids?

> 
> Will we get youtube preview vids?

TheWinterOwl and EnterElysium have their videos up now. As of this video the rest of the youtubers who do the videos have yet to make a video (I think, they may just not be appearing in my Youtube Subscriptions section).

EDIT1: Scott's video is out.

Cool, thanks.

Going to watch those as I'll get more info out of that than the livestream atm
It looks like Porkjet redid the 1.25m inline cockpit.
I notice that in scotts preview, some of the craft preview images aren't working, wonder what's up with that.
Contract text generation is still as non-sensical as ever.

I SEE SMOKE COMING OUT OF THE BOTTOM OF THE LAUNCHPAD! Scotts video!

The fairing pieces are non-persistent, would still like to see a clamshell fairing though opening with the new one.

> 
> **WE'VE BROKEN PLAID FACTOR 2!** Expect a small decrease in speed, then a faster accelleration! Get to KSPTV NOW!

Damn, spilled my drink again...

> 
> We've passed Plaid Factor 3!

\*sploosh\*

Can't you guys keep this thing level, dammit!!!

\*grabs 42 cocktail napkins...\*
